P

Pawn - Class in chess
Pawn class implements the rules of the pawn piece.
Pawn(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class chess.Pawn
Default constructor.
pawnPromotionTo - Static variable in class chess.Chess
indicates which piece the pawn is promoting to
pawnPromotionTranslator(String, char, int, int) - Method in class chess.Player
Pawn promotion translator creates a new instance of the piece the pawn is promoting to.
Piece - Class in chess
Piece is an abstract class that acts as a base to all of the different pieces in the game of chess.
Piece(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class chess.Piece
Default constructor.
pieces - Variable in class chess.Player
array of pieces that the player has
Player - Class in chess
Player class creates a player for the game.
Player(String) - Constructor for class chess.Player
Default constructor.
Position - Class in chess
Position helper class to indicate the location of the piece on the game board.
Position(int, int) - Constructor for class chess.Position
Default constructor.
printError(String) - Static method in class chess.Chess
Prints the error message for an illegal move
